txt.en: Orders might drop from many enemies found throughout Parth Daenath.\n\nYou should intercept Enemy orders for Amroth.

'We know the broad strokes of our enemies' movements, but we need more detailed information about their plans. If you can find the orders sent between their camps, we might fashion a more complete picture of their upcoming strategies. Find such a thing and bring it to me.'
King Amroth requires knowledge of enemy movements in order to plan his next attack.
Amroth can be found at Echad-in-Edhil.\n\nYou should bring the Enemy orders to Amroth.

'So it is true! You have brought me just what I sought, and I thank you for doing so! Let us now organize our attacks to coincide with their movements. Perhaps we can sow confusion within their ranks, and improve the position of our own soldiers.'
Bring the Enemy's orders to Amroth
